basics.name: Jonathon Hackbarth

Specialized in M365 Copilot implementation, AI-enhanced automation, and enterprise governance. Proven track record: $15M annual savings, 90% ticket reduction, 100k+ user frameworks.

projects.name: quikconvert.app
projects.description: Fast, accessible web application for converting cooking and kitchen measurements instantly
